Multiple Field Grouping Grid with Paging, Filtering and DWR integration

This is another example of the Multiple Grid Paging Extention (See basic example)
As per the previous example it gets its data from a back end service, but this time using DWR instead of simply accessing a URL and expecting a JSON reponse.
For this there has to be a Java WorkOrderService exposed by DWR. This service will expect a "criteria" object to be passed in and the service will return an Array of WorkOrder objects. The criteria object are typically based on the GraphCriteria base class, and the returned domain objects are typically based on the GraphDataObject base class,
The query fields in the criteria object are typically based on the various CriteriaField objects like StringCriteriaField. The filter plug-in for the Grid will be a customized version such that it is compatible with these.

Below is a working Example...

Note: At this point there is no sample Java Backend available that supports this example

This example is based on the JaffaRIA, JaffaCore, JaffaSOA and DWR deployments within the JAFFA project.

JaffaRIA can be downloaded and built from the CVS source, or daily builds can found at http://jaffa.sf.net/repository/

Example source code can be found here

  • tests/extjs/multigroup/MultiGroupDWR.html
  • tests/extjs/multigroup/MultiGroupDWR.js
